response.overview: In the mystical jungles of Putumayo, Colombia, there is a sacred mine belonging to the land of the Panguart that is protected by a powerful Shaman called Mutumbajoy. The thirst for power of a sinister sorcerer named Cuquimbo and a ruthless emerald cutter named Tolima break the peace of the village by undertaking a disastrous plan in complicity with two traitorous natives of the Panguart clan; who, blinded by ambition, help to massacre their own people of ancient knowledge, taking their lands to exploit the mines. The brave Zumák remains alive, who will be the warrior chosen by the spirit of Mutumbajoy, who inherits his ancestral knowledge and turns it into the hope that will prevent the total annihilation of this community and preserve what remains of the jungle.
response.title: Chamán: El Último Guerrero
